TextView.android:text: 1- Admission dues will be deposited at the time of interview. No further time will be given and next applicant on merit will be entertained. 2- Bring original documents at the time of interview. 3- Interview schedule in prospectus. No further information will be delivered. 4- If any applicant dose not claim additional 20 marks of Hifiz-e-Quran / Industrial subject in merit, he himself will be responsible for this negligence. 5- Do not forget to bring Original domicile along with other Documents and Admission dues.
Application procedure on reserved quota is as,

1-Applicants from Northern areas will submit their applications Through Directorate of education Northern Areas Gilgit 2-Aplicants from Azad Kashmir will send their applications through Azad Kashmir Nomination Board via Ministry of Kashmir 3-Army personal/Defense services' children will submit their applications through GHQ Rawalpindi / naval Head Quarter Islamabad / Air Head Quarter Islamabad 4-Above written serial no 2 and 4 will send nomination to Zonal Manager TEVTA south zone 5-Applicants of Reciprocal base will submit their applications through competent authority to General Manager Operation TEVTA Lahore 6-Disable applicants will submit disable certificate issued by District Medical Board 7-TEVTA employee's children will submit applications through controlling officer of employee and zonal Manager.
# Document 1 Photo (Passport Size) 8 Nos. 2 Result Card Matric 8 Nos. 3 Domicile/B-Form 2 Nos. 4 Character Certificate 2 Nos. 5 CNIC (Father/Guardian) 3 Nos.
